Title: Relates to service of notice of parking violations
Summary: Allows a notice of any parking violation to be sent by first class mail to any person alleged to be liable as an owner of the motor vehicle within fourteen business days if the owner is a New York state resident or forty-five business days for a non-resident.
LawCode: Add ยง1605, amd ยง238, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the service of notice of parking violations
